rukus.text: arau ami iyara agata ibraahimaka subhabud'dhi arau sathika jnana dana karaichilo arau ami te'omra bisaye achilo samyaka paraijnata
Yetiya te'om te'omra pitrka arau nija sampradayaka ka’le, ‘e'i murtibora ki, yiborara pujata tomaloka asakta haicha!’
Sihamte ka’le, ‘ami amara pitr-purausasakalaka e'iborara ibadata karaote dekhicho’
Te'om ka’le, ‘arasye tomaloke arau tomalokara pitr-purausasakale'o spasta bibhraantita acha’
Sihamte ka’le, ‘tumi amara ocarata satya lai ahicha neki, ne tumi amara lagata dhemali karaicha
te'om ka’le, ‘baram tomalokara raba se'ijane'i yijana akasasamuha arau prthiraira raba, yiye e'ibora srsti karaiche, arau e'i bisaye ma'i an'yatama saksi’
‘Arau allahara sapata! Tomaloke guci yoraara pichata ma'i tomalokara murtiborara bisaye arasye kausala aralambana karaima’
Tara pichata te'om murtisamuha curna-bicurna karai dile kerala danara murtitora bahirae; yate sihamte tara ocaralai ubhati yaya
Sihamte ka’le, ‘amara upasyaborara saite kone e'i kama karaiche? Si niscaya an'yatama yalima’
Kichumane ka’le, ‘ami ejana yurakaka e'iborara samalocana karaote sunicho; yaka ibraahima buli koraa haya’
Sihamte ka’le, ‘teneha’le taka jana sanmukhata upasthita karaa, yate sihamte saksya haya’
Sihamte ka’le, ‘he ibraahima! Tumiye amara upasyaborara saite e'i kama karaicha neki’
te'om ka’le, ‘baram ihamtara e'i pradhanajane'i kijani e'i kama karaiche, eteke e'iboraka sudhi coraa, yadi ihamta katha ka’ba parae’
Tetiya sihamte nije'i punara bibecana karai dekhile arau ijane sijanaka ka’le, ‘niscaya tomaloke'i acala an'yayakarai’
Tara pichata sihamtara sira nata ha’la arau ka’le, ‘tumi dekhuna jana'i ye, ihamte katha kaba noraarae’
Te'om ka’le, ‘teneha’le tomaloke allahara paraibarte ene bastura ibadata karaa neki yitorae tomalokara kono upakara karaiba noraarae arau apakarao karaiba noraarae
‘dhika tomalokara prati arau allahara paraibarte tomaloke yiborara ibadata karaa se'iborara prati! Tathapi'o tomaloke nubujane’
sihamte ka’le, ‘yadi tomaloke kiba karaiba bicaraa tente iyaka ju'ita purai marai peloraa arau tomalokara upasyaborara sahaya karaa’
Ami ka’lo, ‘he ju'i! Tumi ibraahimara babe sitala arau niraapada hai yoraa’
Arau sihamte te'omra ksati sadhana karaara iccha karaichila. Kintu ami sihamtake'i bechi ksatigrasta karai dilo
Arau ami te'omka arau lutaka ud'dhara karai lai ga’lo se'i desata, ya’ta srsti jagatara babe ami kalyana raakhicho
Arau ami te'omka (ibraahimaka) dana karaichilo ichahakba lagate atiraikta puraskarasbaraupe dana karaichilo iyakubaka; arau pratyekake karaichilo satkarmaparaayana

Arau ami te'omlokaka netrtba dana karaichilo, te'omloke amara nirdesa anusarae manuhaka sathika patha dekhuraa'ichila; arau ami te'omlokaka satkarma karaibalai, chalata kayema karaibalai arau yakata pradana karaibalai ahi praerana karaichilo; arau te'omloka amarae'i ibadatakarai achila

Arau lutaka ami dana karaichilo prajna arau jnana, arau te'omka ami ud'dhara karaichilo ene eta janapadara paraa yara adhibasibilaka lipta achila aslila kamata; niscaya sihamta achila eta beya phachikba sampradaya
Arau te'omka ami amara anugrahara antarbhukta karaichilo; te'om achila satkarmaparaayana sakalara an'yatama
